question: Imagine you are Dipsas. Write a diary entry about your knowledge of magic arts and the charms of Ææa.
gold_answer: Diary Entry — My reputation as a mistress of the magic arts and the charms of Ææa precedes me. These stories, told in Metamorphoses, travel far and wide, even as Jupiter’s utter hatred of the Telchines echoes through Olympus. Ovid’s words ensure my legend endures.
